text:
Cover Art
Floating Fish
Winner: 2009 Chesley Award for Best Magazine Cover
Originally an archaeologist, Mats discovered digital art four years ago and decided to switch careers. He took a two-year course in traditional painting, and then landed a concept art job at EA Dice in Stockholm. After a year, he decided to go freelance and is mainly working on book illustrations. He lives in Lund, Sweden.
